Ran away to the start of the dungeon!

Shadows dance on the uneven walls of the dungeon, brought to life by the light of %1$s\'s torch. The air is stale and damp. The only testimony of life are countless trails of small dusty footprints that seemingly lead nowhere. One particular trail seems fresh. %1$s starts to follow them. \n After following the tracks for several tense minutes, %1$s reaches a room closed off with a shoddy wooden door. Sounds of rustling and metallic clanking come from within.
The goblin inside startles as %1$s opens the door and grabs for his blade!

The dungeon opens up to a larger room, accommodating crumbling vases and sarcophagi. The ancient artifacts are covered in a thick layer of dust. Cobwebs hang from the ceiling, some inhabited by skittering crawlers. The room is beset by an eerie silence, sometimes broken by sharp squeaks. Bones litter the floor around a stone door which shows no handle.
Touching the door sends out a wave of magical energy, animating the bones nearby!
The door begins to open with a rumble, disturbing a giant rat!

%1$s\'s footsteps echo in the silent halls of the dungeon. This part of the dungeon is suspiciously clean. Not a single cobweb decorates these worn halls. After a several minutes walk, faint sounds of bubbling reach %1$\'s ears. The bubbling grows louder as %1$s approaches its source, stopping at an iron grate. The popping sounds can be heard from within.
The grate leads to a room in which resides a gelatinous cube!
%1$s was defeated! Received 2 XP and %2$d gold.

Opening the door %2$s, sees a goblin figure hunched over a wooden barrel. The goblin startles at %2$s\'s approach and scurries away. \n \n Among useless pieces of rusty iron, inside the barrel %2$s finds a %1$s!

Opening the iron grate, %1$s enters an abandoned room. Parchment litters the floor. In the center of the room stands a dusty table sporting pieces of mushrooms, colorful dust, shattered vials, and a bubbling pot of purple liquid. \n \n %1$s recognises, that the liquid has restorative qualities!
As %1$s touches the stone door, runes begin to form upon it\'s surface as if from mist. \n \n %1$s recognises the runes as a riddle.
%1$s feels a racking headache as the room around dims. %1$s suffers 2 damage. The riddle shifts and changes.
The words of the riddle fade and the door opens with a rumble.
